alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD AND SOUTHWESTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairfield, or near Bridgeport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Milford, Shelton, Newtown, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Westport, Monroe, Seymour, Orange, Derby, Woodbridge, and West Haven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
